author: bdy
post_text: March 25, 2020 at 12:37 PM#1Hi there,I cannot find a solution. Is it possible to make a store option as a variable?I have 2 que sequence that set what option I want with storing a group.[color=#00FF00]SetUserVar[/color] $WHAT = "/remove"or[color=#00FF00]SetUserVar[/color] $WHAT = "/merge"then in macro, I'm storing a group[color=#00FF33]Store Group[/color] 201 $WHATIn command-line feedback, everything looks good but I always have a pop window. And if I do /nc merge or remove doesn't work. I tried almost every combination but without a solution.Thank you!Daniel
title: store option as variable
